p: The cell entry receptor differs between those viruses as well. HCoV-229E binds human aminopeptidase N (APN, CD13) while HCoV-NL63 and SARS-CoV use angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) 2 as their receptor. According to their HE protein, HCoV-OC43 and HKU1 use 9- O-acetylated sialic acids attached to cell surface proteins. MERS-CoV requires dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4, CD26) for cell entry ( Hulswit et al., 2019; Raj et al., 2013).
